title: [GAMEPLAY] Riot Ward Skin Bug
body: When using the *Riot ward skin* it appears that if you upgrade the warding totem trinket into the greater vision totem, the ward it places becomes the *bouquet ward skin* instead of the *Riot ward skin*. This doesn't occur with regular pink vision wards, only with the ward from the greater vision totem.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue that should be fixed soon!
Seems like a lot of the greater trinket ward skins are bugged. I don't have battlecast ward I have poro ward. this is clearly not a poro ward.
